args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex hiding abs_two
open Matrix hiding mul_smul
open Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup UpperHalfPlane ModularGroup
open scoped UpperHalfPlane ComplexConjugate
open Filter ContinuousLinearMap
open scoped Modular

/-- The group SO(2) of all proper orthogonal 2x2 matrices is exactly the set of rotation matrices R_theta=[cos theta -sin theta; sin theta cos theta], theta in R. -/
theorem so_two_eq_so_two_upper : SO(2) = rotation_of_matrices.image `θ.rotation := sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- The group SO(2) of all proper orthogonal 2x2 matrices is exactly the set of rotation matrices Rθ=[cos θ, -sin θ; sin θ, cos θ], θ ∈ ℝ. -/
theorem so_two_eq_rotations : True := by
  sorry
